lighting
Class AreaLight

java.lang.Object
  lighting.AbstractLight
      lighting.AreaLight
All Implemented Interfaces:
ILight
public class AreaLight
extends AbstractLight

This class represents an area light (like point light but it has a area which is not zero).

getIterator

public java.util.Iterator<ILight> getIterator()
Returns an iterator for the light source. If it is a single light source, it will return an iterator with itself inside. Otherwise it will return an iterator with multiple inner light sources. (i.e area light).

Specified by:
getIterator in interface ILight
Overrides:
getIterator in class AbstractLight
Returns:
Iterator for all the inner light sources.
